titleStmt.title: A proclamation discharging the payment of the rents of the bishopricks to any, but the persons named by the Council. At Edinburgh, the nineteenth day of September, 1689.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, by order of his Majesties Privy Council,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Secreti Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: order of his Majesties Privy Council
